REASON: slight shakiness, mild accelerated heartrate, mild dizziness when taking more than one dose per day.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR VENTOLIN ROTACA: I'm not sure if these are still commercially available, but they worked very well for me as I was sensitive to the aerosol propellant used in a traditional 'puffer'.

VENTOLIN+ROTACAPS: I already had tremor, postural and intention tremor, have noticed no difference. On a couple of occasions heart raced a little.
